mapper.select: /* selectBoardCategory */ SELECT IDX AS CATEGORY_IDX, NAME, ORDER_SEQ FROM BOARD_CATEGORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY ORDER_SEQ ASC

/* selectBoardList */ SELECT BP.IDX, BP.TITLE, BP.USER_IDX AS WRITER_USER_IDX, UI.NAME AS WRITER_USER_NAME, VIEWS, DATE_FORMAT(BP.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DATE FROM BOARD_POST BP INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON BP.USER_IDX = UI.IDX WHERE BP.USE_YN = 'Y' AND BP.CATEGORY_IDX = #{categoryIdx} ORDER BY BP.IDX DESC

/* selectBoardDetail */ SELECT BP.IDX, BP.TITLE, BP.CONTENT, BP.USER_IDX AS WRITER_USER_IDX, UI.NAME AS WRITER_USER_NAME, VIEWS, DATE_FORMAT(BP.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DATE FROM BOARD_POST BP INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON BP.USER_IDX = UI.IDX WHERE BP.IDX = #{idx}
mapper.update: /* addView */ UPDATE BOARD_POST SET VIEWS = IFNULL(VIEWS, 0) + 1 WHERE IDX = #{idx}
mapper.insert: /* insertPost */ INSERT INTO BOARD_POST ( CATEGORY_IDX, USER_IDX, TITLE, CONTENT, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{categoryIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE() )
